color_body_bg_secondary.label: Secondary background
color_body_bg_secondary.info: Used for backgrounds on home and product pages.

header-transparent-background.label: Overlay background
header-transparent-background.info: Used for the overlay cart count and when 'Overlay background opacity' is more than 0%.

add_to_cart_action.label: When adding an item to cart…

show_cart_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_cart_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations are based on the products in the cart. They use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

badges.info: Add custom badges using Product tags. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/23331443929489)
badges.label: Badges

show_rating.label: Show star rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/18953803693457-How-to-set-up-Star-ratings-reviews)

color_swatch_info.content: To create swatches go to ‘Theme settings > Swatches’.

display_style.label: Display style
display_style.info: If set to 'over image' button will show as icon on smaller screens and on hover on larger screens.

show_app_blocks_in_quick_view.label: Show app blocks in quick view
show_app_blocks_in_quick_view.info: The app must work outside the product template.

hover_navigation_desktop.label: Slider navigation style (desktop)
hover_navigation_desktop.info: Used on ‘Recommended products’, ‘Recently viewed’ and ‘Featured collection’ sections.

swatches.name: Swatches
swatches.info: Swatches can be created using Category metafields or Variant images. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/27864028041745-How-to-set-up-swatches)

show_variant_image_for_options.label: Use variant images
show_variant_image_for_options.info: To use variant images for swatches use a comma separated list with the Option names you want to create swatches for (e.g. 'Material,Color,Flavour,Chain-length'). [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/27864028041745-How-to-set-up-swatches#h_01J6YT6WM2K14R01JJCHJ0QKSJ)

paragraph-0.content: On mobile the back-to-top button will only show on scroll up

enable_breadcrumbs.label: Enable breadcrumbs
enable_breadcrumbs.info: Show breadcrumb navigation below header on products, blogs and pages.

pop-up-time.label: Frequency
pop-up-time.info: Number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

popup--show-social-icons.label: Show social media icons
popup--show-social-icons.info: To choose which icons to display go to ‘Theme settings > Social media’.

pop-up-delay.label: Show after
pop-up-delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for visibility.

popup--test-mode.label: Enable test mode
popup--test-mode.info: Forces the popup to show on every refresh, and should only be used for editing the popup. Ensure this setting is disabled when launching your store.

verification-pop-up__test-mode.label: Enable test mode
verification-pop-up__test-mode.info: Forces the verification to show on every refresh, and should only be used for editing the popup. Ensure this setting is disabled when launching your store.

header-15.info: This content will display if the user does not meet the verification requirements.

background-info.content: Shown when not using an image.

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px.

Animations.name: Animations
Animations.info: Enabling animations can impact page speed.

animations_enabled.label: Enable animations on load
animations_enabled.info: Selected content fades in and selected images zoom out as the section loads.

page_fade_enabled.label: Enable page fade transition
page_fade_enabled.info: Allow pages to fade in and out on load.

ken_burns_enabled.label: Enable linked image animations
ken_burns_enabled.info: If an image is linked to a page then the image will zoom in.

colors.info: Shown when not using an image.

text_dynamic.info: Use a comma separated list to add multiple words.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

header-0.info: Choose the blog posts you want to feature.
Choose the blog you want to feature.

navigation.paragraph: Display a Menu (edited in Online store > Navigation > Menus) or a Collection list. Use metafields to show specific Collection lists based on the location. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/26904250141201-How-to-use-metafields-in-the-Navigation-banner-section)

block_alignment.label: Block alignment
block_alignment.info: Only visible when blocks in a row are different heights.

timer_complete_message.info: This message will replace your text when the timer reaches zero.

settings.description_info: Tip: For longer descriptions add the ‘Collection description’ section at the the bottom of the template to gain SEO benefits without making your customers scroll past it.
settings.desktop_image_info: Optional. This will override the collection image. 2000 x 900px recommended.
settings.mobile_image_info: Optional. This will override the collection image. 3000 x 1000px recommended.
settings.parallax_info: Parallax won't trigger when section height is set to 'Original'.
settings.image_only_settings: The following settings only apply when an image is added.

collection_img.info: 1600 x 1600px recommended. Optional. Overrides collection image.

settings.view_all_button_info: To change 'Quick shop' or slider navigation buttons go to 'Theme settings > Product cards'.

buttons_style.info: To change 'Quick shop' button go to 'Theme settings' > 'Product cards' > 'Quick shop button'.

text_color.info: Not visible when using an image on mobile.

override_button_colors.info: Overriding will enable the color settings below (except when using an image on mobile).

image_only_settings.info: The following settings only apply when an image is added.

paragraph-0.content: Add this block to show a message when the timer reaches zero.

expand_card.label: Expand event cards to fill last row

tbc.label: Override date with 'TBC'
tbc.info: Using this will hide any date and time settings and display a TBC message in its place.

price.info: Use a numerical value to display price in your store currency (e.g. '10'). If using multiple currencies, use a comma separated list with currency codes. (e.g. 'USD:10, EUR:9, GBP:8')

color.info: Shown when not using an image.

hover_effects.label: Hover effects
hover_effects.info: These settings show when users hover over this menu item.

footer_linklist.label: Footer menu
footer_linklist.info: This menu can only display primary and secondary level menu items.

paragraph-1.content: Edit your social settings and accounts in Theme settings.

paragraph-0.content: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

show_qr_code.label: Show QR code
show_qr_code.info: For in-person use. This can be scanned with the front-facing camera of the device that you use the Shopify POS app on or use a supported 2D barcode scanner.

images.paragraph: You can also show this image on ‘Gift card receipt’ and ‘New gift card’ email notifications. [Learn more](https://www.notion.so/Docs-FAQ-5b752b504bc946bf9ea38a3649fab0e2?pvs=4)

color.info: Shown when not using an image.

overlay_header_contact.label: Enable on contact page
overlay_header_contact.info: Turn off breadcrumbs when enabling on contact page.

overlay_logo.label: Overlay logo
overlay_logo.info: To show overlay header, add a compatible section as the first section. [Learn more](https://support.maestrooo.com/article/312-header-how-to-enable-transparent-header)

overlay_opacity.label: Overlay background opacity
overlay_opacity.info: Adjust to ensure your menu is readable.

logo_max_width_mobile.info: Size may adjust based on available space.

header-14.info: When the first section is compatible overlay the header. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25730695541649/preview/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MjU3MzA2OTU1NDE2NDksImV4cCI6MTcxNzc2NjQxNn0.MmKVeR8OEFbCgvCcjDNeHIf6poddcQR7JYu0t-TUVLo)

show_icons.label: Show icons on desktop
show_icons.info: Switches the Account, Search and Cart links to icons.

header-11.info: To edit the drawer and add offers, go to 'Overlay > Offers drawer'.

offers_drawer_show_tooltip.paragraph: The tooltip displays for 5 seconds on first load of the website then once per day.
offers_drawer_show_tooltip.label: Show tooltip

offers_drawer_tooltip_test_mode.label: Enable test mode
offers_drawer_tooltip_test_mode.info: Forces the tooltip to show on every refresh, and should only be used for editing the tooltip. Ensure this setting is disabled when launching your store.

mega-menu.info: Enter an existing menu item to apply a mega menu dropdown. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25140032079633-How-to-set-up-a-mega-menu)

overlay_info.content: The following settings only apply when text overlays the image.

full-width.label: One image per row on mobile

peek_desktop.label: Peek next image
peek_desktop.info: Only applies when 'Style' is set to 'Slider'.

blocks.paragraph: The following settings apply when text overlays the image.

parallax.info: Parallax won't be visible when the 'Section height' is set to 'Original'.

colors.info: The colors in each 'scheme' can be changed in the 'General settings' > 'Colors' section of your admin.

first_button_label.label: First button label
first_button_label.info: The whole slide will act as a link if label is left empty.

paragraph-8.content: Select a gift wrap product at Theme settings > Products

paragraph-0.content: The contact form sends all submissions to the Sender email address of your store. You can edit this email in your Shopify admin settings > Store details > Contact information.

navigation_button_color.label: Navigation button color
navigation_button_color.info: You can also update slide button colors on the individual slide’s settings.

override_navigation_button_colors.label: Override navigation button colors
override_navigation_button_colors.info: Overriding will enable the color settings below.

secondary_color.label: Secondary color
secondary_color.info: Only applies to text when Button style is ‘Filled’.

paragraph.content: To edit the offers drawer icon, go to 'Header > Offers drawer icon'.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map.

comments.label: Comments
comments.info: To enable/disable comments go to 'Content > Blog posts > Manage blogs > Select the blog > Comments'.

parallax.info: Parallax won't be visible when the 'Image size' is set to 'Original'.

paragraph-9.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections below.

paragraph-13.content: [Edit your password page message in your Shopify settings](http://www.shopify.com/admin/online_store/preferences).

social_media_icons.info: To choose which icons to display go to 'Theme settings > Social media'.

background_info.content: Shown when not using an image.

paragraph-0.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

preorder.info_text: Add a tag of 'Preorder' to any product to set the Buy button wording to 'Preorder'. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25232847289745-How-to-set-up-a-Preorder-product)

app_margin_bottom.info: Control the spacing below any app blocks displaying in the product form.

variant_style.info: To create swatches go to ‘Theme settings > Swatches’.
variant_style.swatch_info: Visual swatches can be created using Category metafields or Variant images. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/27864028041745-How-to-set-up-swatches)

thumbnail_changes_variant.label: Change variant based on the thumbnail

info.content: If you're a Plus merchant we recommend using the Combined Listings app for this functionality. [Learn more](https://www.shopify.com/enterprise/blog/combined-listings)

sold_out_products_info.content: Products that are sold out will not display.

paragraph-2.content: These settings only apply when 'Enable collapsible tab' is checked.

info.content: Tab is hidden if 'Text' or 'Page' is empty. Use 'Page' for more dynamic content like tables and lists.

paragraph-0.content: Select a gift wrap product at Theme settings > Products. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020396138-How-to-Enable-Product-Gift-Wrapping).

enable_gift_card_recipient_form.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
enable_gift_card_recipient_form.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

paragraph-0.content: Locations must be set up to enable display. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/locations)
Show the product tags, collection/s and type

To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. If products are sold out they will not display. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

social_sharing.name: Share on social
social_sharing.info: Edit your social media settings in 'Theme settings > Social media'.

paragraph.content: Use this block to rate your product features, e.g. 'Spice level' or 'Material thickness'.

Collect customization information for an item added to the cart. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25697916845841-How-to-Add-Custom-Fields-to-Product-Pages-Text-Fields-Radio-Buttons-Uploads-Checkbox-and-Dropdowns)

required.label: Required
required.info: If checked, the customer will need to complete this field before they can add to cart.

paragraph.content: Collect customization information for an item added to the cart. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25697916845841-How-to-Add-Custom-Fields-to-Product-Pages-Text-Fields-Radio-Buttons-Uploads-Checkbox-and-Dropdowns)

required.label: Required
required.info: If checked, the customer will need to complete this field before they can add to cart.

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3).

required.label: Required
required.info: If checked, the customer will need to complete this field before they can add to cart.

required.label: Required
required.info: If checked, the customer will need to complete this field before they can add to cart.

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3).

paragraph.content: Collect customization information for an item added to the cart. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/25697916845841-How-to-Add-Custom-Fields-to-Product-Pages-Text-Fields-Radio-Buttons-Uploads-Checkbox-and-Dropdowns)

required.label: Required
required.info: If checked, the customer will need to complete this field before they can add to cart.

character_limit.label: Character limit
character_limit.info: Optional. E.g. “200” will give a character limit of 200.

text.name: Text
text.label_default: Share content or link to a resource.

image.info: Will not display if autoplay is enabled.

template--cart.name: Cart
template--cart.info: For all cart settings open 'Theme settings' below.

overlay_image.label: Overlay image
overlay_image.info: We recommend using a transparent png for best results. 1600 x 1600px recommended.

all.color_scheme_width_info: Only visible when ‘width’ is less than 100%.
all.Heading: Heading
all.Autoplay_info: Videos are muted to allow autoplay.
all.Videos_are_muted: Videos are automatically muted when set to ‘Autoplay’.
all.Video_will_be_muted_and_some_devices_may: Video will be muted and some devices may prevent autoplay.
all.If_a_color_is_selected_it_will_override_: Optional. If a color is selected, it will override the color scheme.
Optional. If a color is selected, it will override the section colors.
all.Secondary_button_color_info: Only applies to text when Button style is 'Filled'.
all.open_link_in_new_tab: Open link in a new tab
all.Button_color_info: Optional. If button colors are selected, it will override the colors set in ‘Theme settings > Colors > Buttons’.
all.Button_color_override_info: Overriding will enable the color settings below.
all.To_choose_which_icons_to_display_go_to_T: To choose which icons to display go to 'Theme settings > Social media'.
all.Accepts_YouTube_and_Vimeo__Video_will_be: Accepts YouTube and Vimeo. Video will be muted and some devices may prevent autoplay. [Learn more](https://support.eightthemes.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020109497-Product-Media#heading-2)
all.Use_the_format_hh_mm_ss_eg__23_59_59__Us: Use the format hh:mm:ss, eg. 23:59:59. Use the timezone specified in your Shopify admin.
all.Title: Title
all.To_add_a_country_region_go_to_your_marke: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)
all.To_add_a_language_go_to_your_language_se: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
all.Lets_customers_check_out_directly_using_: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
all.Label: Label
all.To_display_a_rating_add_a_product_rating: To display a rating, add a [product rating metafield](/admin/metafields/product). E.g. '10'
all.Select_a_maximum_equal_to_the_rating_met: Select a maximum equal to the rating metafield's [scale maximum](/admin/metafields/product).
all.Product_inventory_must_be_tracked_to_use: Product inventory must be tracked to use this functionality.
all.Out_of_stock_products_show_Classic_count: Out of stock products show 'Classic count'.
all.When_stock_level_is_lower_than_low_stock: When stock is below low stock threshold
all.Embedded_video_info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.
all.Collapsible_tab_info: Visible only when content is available.
all.optional_link_removed_when_block_link_is: Optional. The link will be removed if a block with a link is added.
all.optional_link_removed_when_button_is_add: Optional. The link will be removed if a button is added.
all.parallax_info: Parallax won't trigger when 'Section height' is set to 'Original'.
all.Video_alt_text_info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers.
all.Overlay_info_label: The following settings only apply when text overlays the image.
all.code_info: Code won't copy when inside the theme editor.
